SummaryEnglish: In a town filled with food, Bread is a master cake decorator who gives life-changing makeovers that will put any customer in an amazing mood.

36.TitleEnglish: A Bun to Remember / Rival, Baguette

1.SummaryEnglish: Bread, the best barber in Bakery Town! One day, a biscuit boy comes to Bread and challenges him to avenge his father... Can the Biscuit Boy win the haircut contest with Bread?

2.SummaryEnglish: Bread gets scolded by Choco today. Wilk asks Bread how he got to work with Choco. Bread tells of his first meeting with Choco... What is your first impression of Choco?

3.SummaryEnglish: Bread fell into a slump after being evaluated as bored! Does stress cause your hair to fall out?! Try several methods to treat hair loss. Will Bread be able to stop his hair loss?

4.SummaryEnglish: Bakery Town's most popular idol Macaron~ But I'm getting tired of my tight schedule... Then, by chance, he meets Wilk and becomes friends! Macaron tours Bakery Town with Wilke.

5.SummaryEnglish: An ice cream boy who is tired of living in a refrigerator only eating frozen food. He runs away from the refrigerator and enjoys various delicious foods in Bakery Town. But the ice cream boy starts to melt in the hot weather! Wilke finds Ice Cream and takes him to the barber shop.

6.SummaryEnglish: Pretzel, a young police officer who protects Bakery Town! But Pretzel has a fatal flaw... It's like having holes all over your body! Can Pretzel be a good cop?

7.SummaryEnglish: An abandoned house where a great treasure is hidden! But there are ghosts living there... The Bread Barbershop family goes to the mansion to find the treasure! Can you safely find the treasure in the haunted house?

8.SummaryEnglish: Butter stuns fans with his breathtakingly handsome looks! In the end, he is locked up in the house for treason... Butter, wanting to get out of the house, decides to be ugly and calls Bread. Can Bread turn butter ugly?

9.SummaryEnglish: Potato chip is spying on the popular Bread Barbershop. Today, seeing Wilk scolded by Bread, he thinks of good thoughts... That's right, making a robot Wilk to kill Bread! Potato Chip imprisons the real Wilk and sends the robot Wilk to the Bread Barbershop...

10.SummaryEnglish: Two Tayaki mothers are fighting over a baby each thinks is their own. Asking the Cake Queen to find her real mother... But the Tayaki look so alike! The Cake Queen asks Bread for a solution.

11.SummaryEnglish: Bread and Choco get melancholy on Mondays... Wilk prepares for a team building competition to recharge morale! Wilke is taught secrets from Croissant, the best recreation instructor. Will Wilke's contest be successful?

12.SummaryEnglish: Cheese went to the playground with sausage. But gets kicked out of the playground because of the smell... Sausage proposes to make a playground for sour cheese! Can sausage and cheese make a wonderful playground?

13.SummaryEnglish: A blue crab cake boy who thinks he is a real blue crab! When he sees the water, he tries to jump... The stuffy blue crab cake couple visits Bread, and the blue crab cake boy is excited at the thought of becoming a real blue crab.

14.SummaryEnglish: On the way to work, Wilk accidentally helps a pretzel seller and receives an old kettle. The true identity of the old kettle is the magic kettle that grants wishes! The Steamed Bread Fairy in the Magic Pot tells Wilk that he will grant 300 wishes! Wilk begins to make everyone's wishes come true...

15.SummaryEnglish: Potato Chip makes a chip to control Bread to bankrupt the Bread Barbershop! If he puts this chip on Bread's forehead, he will behave the way Potato Chip wants?! Will Bread be able to survive Potato Chip's scheme?

16.SummaryEnglish: A cake princess who came to the Bread Barbershop to get her bridal makeup before the wedding. He puts a colorful decoration on her head and learns the truth... Cheesecake appears in front of the weary barber shop family. And her ex-boyfriend is the Cake Princess's groom-to-be?! The Bread Barbershop family goes out to help the cheesecake get revenge.

17.SummaryEnglish: The barber shop family mets potato chip in the arcade. Bread and Potato Chip bet on a punching game and the winner gets a member of the barber shop staff... The winning potato chip takes sausage! Can potato chip and sausage get along well?

18.SummaryEnglish: Bread broke both arms from overexertion! He and Wilke start to binge on chocolate... Eventually Wilk and Choco run away from Bread. Will Bread be able to keep the barber shop on his own?

19.SummaryEnglish: Choco sticks to a single life~ Aunt Donut arranges a blind date for Choco like that... The identity of the blind date is a bagel with perfect specifications! What is the fate of Choco and Bagel?

20.SummaryEnglish: Wilke broke the barber shop mirror! Wilk is buying an old mirror from an antique shop... The true identity of the old mirror is the mirror used by the best barbers of the Renaissance?! But a terrifying ghost appears in the mirror...

21.SummaryEnglish: A cake princess who is obsessed with mobile phone games and doesn't even show up at her birthday party. But the game is too difficult for Cake Princess! At that time, he meets Cheese, who is extremely good at games. But cheese soon leaves the Cake Palace... The Cake Princess is desperately looking for cheese.

22.SummaryEnglish: Wilke wants to get a good haircut like Bread. He makes a wish to the steamed bread fairy he met in a dream that he wants to become like Bread... The next day, Bread and Wilk swap bodies?! Will Wilk, who has become bread, be able to get a haircut?

23.SummaryEnglish: The Strawberry Cake and Chocolate Cake families have been enemies for generations! But chocolate cake Romeo and strawberry cake Juliet fall in love... Ultimately, Romeo decides to become a strawberry cake to fulfill his love for Juliet. Bread starts decorating Romeo with strawberry cake...

24.SummaryEnglish: As a child, Bread left home with his father, Brandon, out of fear of being compared to his elite brothers. Brandon announces that he will visit the Bread Barbershop... Wilk, Choco, and the guest bread after hearing about Bread's situation, go ahead with the 'superstar bread making operation'. Can Bread give Brandon a good look?

25.SummaryEnglish: Wilk goes to the beauty school reunion! But unlike Wilk, who cleans at the barbershop, his friends already have high-level barber skills... Wilke and his friends happen to volunteer for a haircut at a moldy mildew patient's village. Can Wilk transform the heads of moldy buns?

26.SummaryEnglish: Red bean bread that came to the Bread Barbershop after a long time! He introduces Bread to Melon Bread, a student with great skills... Wilk and Melon will have a haircut assistant showdown! Will Wilke be able to beat Melon Bread?

1.SummaryEnglish: When rats attack the residents of Bakery Town, the Cake Queen looks for a sure solution — and someone to blame.

2.SummaryEnglish: Wilk becomes the hair shop's laughingstock when Bread finds out that his parents still treat him like a baby. Can Wilk learn to act his age?

3.SummaryEnglish: Wondering what lies behind the town's great wall, Chocolate Boy raises the question to his grandmother, who has an answer — and a story to tell.

4.SummaryEnglish: After being replaced by Potato Chip's new robot cashier, Choco finds the brilliant math tutor, Mr. Naan, to sharpen her arithmetic skills.

5.SummaryEnglish: At a hairdressing competition where Bread is the record-holding champion, a new contestant joins in, looking to shake things up.

6.SummaryEnglish: Bread attempts to learn yoga after miraculously recovering from a back injury with the help of a gummy yogi and therapist, Ms. Jelly.

7.SummaryEnglish: A series of curious incidents at Bread's shop land Wilk and Choco in trouble. Can they figure out who's been trying to sabotage them?

8.SummaryEnglish: On Halloween, the barbershop trio tour a haunted mansion with performers who aren't spooky at all. Bread lends a hand so they can look the part.

9.SummaryEnglish: On the way to run an errand for Bread, Wilk encounters a poor old lady who sells him beans that hold an extraordinary surprise.

10.SummaryEnglish: When Wilk's cousin from the country comes to town, he impresses Bread with his dessert-making skills — until his passion gets the better of him.

11.SummaryEnglish: Bread narrowly escapes perils of many kinds and realizes that his life is in danger! Can he find out why he has a target on his back?

12.TitleEnglish: The Gold, The Smart, and The Strong
12.SummaryEnglish: When Sausage falls into Lake Sink during a camping trip, the lake's guardian offers Bread and Wilk a different sausage to take home

13.SummaryEnglish: Jealous of Bread's success, Potato Chip decides to travel back in time and stop Bread from pursuing his dream as a hairdresser.

14.SummaryEnglish: The crystal citizens of a sugary city decide to fight back against greedy baked goods — but first, they need Master Bread's help to get bigger.

15.SummaryEnglish: At the Flavor of the Month Contest, Vanilla Ice Cream feels like he's too boring to win — until he gets a visit from Master Bread and Wilk.

16.SummaryEnglish: At the Flavor of the Month Contest, Vanilla Ice Cream feels like he's too boring to win — until he gets a visit from Master Bread and Wilk.

17.SummaryEnglish: Bread is a contestant on "Alley Barbershop," a TV show that saves failing hair salons. Can the Master help three struggling barbers stay in business?

18.SummaryEnglish: Choco recognizes that an overworked and underappreciated mom is due for a makeover — so for her birthday, Choco gives her a present she'll never forget.

19.SummaryEnglish: After learning of the rising real estate prices in Bakery Town, Master Bread decides to renovate the barbershop and discovers a surprise in the walls.

20.SummaryEnglish: Choco runs into a special friend from high school and recounts to Master Bread and Wilk why the two never ended up together as kids. But is it too late?

21.SummaryEnglish: When Master Bread reads negative reviews about his poor fashion choices, he enlists the help of Andre Bun, a talented but sensitive clothing designer.

22.SummaryEnglish: After Cake Queen publicly humiliates Prince Butter Waffle, the prince asks Bread to give him a face that's fit for a king so he can take back the throne.

23.SummaryEnglish: Bread enters Sausage into a Best Sausage Contest in hopes of winning the $1,000 prize — but the pup will have to compete against the queen's spoiled dog.

24.SummaryEnglish: Cake Queen bribes Bread to style her dog for the beauty portion of the Best Sausage Contest. Wilk steps in to cover, but can he compete with the Master?

25.SummaryEnglish: When Butter gets cast in the new "Donut Rangers" movie, fans Bread and Wilk vow to get the Red Donut his job back — by filming a brand-new series.

26.SummaryEnglish: An ecoconscious robot named the Breadinator tracks down Master Bread to share an important message about the future of the environment.

27.SummaryEnglish: When Wilk lets the small alien fugitive, Moono, hide in the barbershop, he repays the favor by using his special powers to help out Bread and friends.

1.SummaryEnglish: When was Master Bread's first love? It goes way back to his younger days... One day, in a hurry to buy some bread, he accidentally bumped into a girl. As fate would have it, Bread ends up protecting Miss Otoro from bullies, and the two gradually grow closer. With his heart pounding, Bread dreams of a happy future together. Will Bread's first love story have a sweet ending?

2.SummaryEnglish: To save Bakery Town from danger, Magical Princess Wilky has arrived! With Wilky's help, peace is restored to Bakery Town. However, Magical Princess Wilky's true identity is revealed, leading Wilk vows to never transform into Magical Princess Wilky again. Can Wilk bring peace to Bakery Town once more?

3.SummaryEnglish: Bakery Town's greatest idol, Macaron, is ambushed by overzealous fans on her way home from work... Just then, Choco appears like a hero and saves Macaron! Macaron is captivated by Choco's tough and chic charm, and she even imitates Choco's style! But the audience's reaction is cold... How will Macaron get through this crisis?

4.SummaryEnglish: Cheese picks up a notebook lying on the street! The baked goods' appearances change based on the way he draws them in the notebook?! Amused and bored, Cheese starts doodling... But chaos ensues as the baked goods' hairstyles turn into a mess-including even Cake Queen's elegant hair! Furious, Cake Queen track down the culprit. The investigation narrows in! What will happen to Cheese?

5.SummaryEnglish: Master Bread's forever rival, Potato Chip, has a shocking secret... Potato Chip once worked at Bread Barbershop!? Bread's jealousy and bullying towards Potato Chip resurfaced, the salty past is revealed... What is the shocking truth behind Potato Chip's past??

6.SummaryEnglish: Cake Queen is out shopping, but... she's short on funds?! To refill the royal treasury, she starts to impose bizarre taxes such as, "Commuter" tax, "Couple" tax, "single" tax, and even an "ugly" tax! The taxes are so high that it's impossible to shop, eat out, and even get a haircut in Bakery Town. As the baked goods' fustration grows... What decision will Cake Queen make?

7.SummaryEnglish: A fashion style war has broken out in Bakery Town! Cool and chic, Team Mint Chocolate! Hot and spicy, Team Mala! Pungent and aromatic, Team Wasabi! Smooth and elegant, Team Rosé! The Baked goods are firecely debating which style is the best! How will Master Bread solve this dispute?

8.SummaryEnglish: Ghosts in the school?! Cheese claims that the ghosts have been appearing ever since a fire broke out in the art room. Bread insists that there's no such thing as ghosts. Cheese and Bread make a bet, with Bread Barbershop on the line... Wilk and Bread hesitate to enter the school disturbed by the creepy atmosphere. Is there really a ghost at the school?

9.SummaryEnglish: There's a new dazzling girl band in Bakery Town! They're the sweet and sour Candys! All eyes are on the band's center, Lemon Candy... But as Lemon Candy grows arrogant, she begins mistreating the other members. She even threatens to leave the group! The Candys are on the verge of disbanding... Will they be able to make a successful comeback?

10.SummaryEnglish: Bread rushes back to find Potato Chip's barbershop a huge hit, thanks to his BreadTube channel and booming ad profits. Determined to catch up, Bread launches his own B-Tube channel. As Bread's popularity rises, a furious Potato Chip sparks an epic rivalry. Will Bread become Bakery Town's top B-Tuber?

11.SummaryEnglish: Choco and Wilk are overwhelmed with work, always called back by Master Bread just as they're about to leave. One day, they receive an enticing offer from the luxurious Madeleine Hair Shop, known for its beautiful design, premium service, and getting off work on time. Compared to Madeleine, Bread Barbershop seems far less appealing. Will Wilk and Choco stay, or move on?

12.SummaryEnglish: A truck zooms towards Director Popcorn! Choco throws herself into danger to save him. Convinced that Choco is the actress he's been searching for, Director Popcorn casts her in his action movie. Choco's career as an action star takes off, but a jealous Miss Cheese begins scheming against her... Things keep getting more dangerous for Choco! Will Choco be able to escape the trouble she's in?

13.SummaryEnglish: Bread Barbershop's troublemaker, Wilk. Master Bread bans Wilk from giving haircuts while he's away on a business trip. But some models who visit the barbershop ask Wilk to style their hair instead of Bread... A golden opportunity to become a fashion model's barber! Will Wilk be able to pull off his first-ever haircut without a hitch?

14.SummaryEnglish: Cake Princess is annoyed at her valets at the royal palace. She goes on an outing for a change of pace. However, when she looks down on the old lady selling flowers on the street, she is cursed and turned into a pink sausage...! Wilk finds her under danger and takes her in. Will the princess be able to return to her original form?

15.SummaryEnglish: Sausage accidentally poops in the barbershop! Bread worries that Sausage isn't potty trained. Just then, sausage trainer Hotdog appears out of nowhere! He invites Bread and Wilk to his sausage training center. Bread is impressed by the well trained sausages. But when they leave Sausage in Hotdog's care, Hotdog reveals his true nature... What will happen to Sausage in this crisis?

16.SummaryEnglish: Butter is the most charming man in Bakery Town, but Director Popcorn is looking for a tough and buff guy... Enter Margarine, the dessert industry's hunk, who oozes charm! Butter is abandoned instantly. Butter goes to Master Bread in order to transform into a tough guy... Will Butter ever be able to make the change?

17.SummaryEnglish: Bakery Town's biggest hit, Hamburger and French Fries, remains unfinished as production was put on hold. During a business trip to a nursing home, Bread visits the two retired stars. Wilk discovers that Hamburger and French Fries have fallen out and sets out to uncover the cause of their feud. Can the two reconcile and complete the long-awaited ending?

18.SummaryEnglish: Ice Cream dreams of becoming Bakery Town's top mukbang star and quickly hits one million subscribers on BreadTube! He even wins a BreadTuber Award and becomes a sensation. One day, a pizza shop owner asks him to promote his pizzas, but a paid advertising controversy soon erupts. Will Ice Cream be able to overcome this crisis?

19.SummaryEnglish: The Mocha Bun Boys dream of becoming Bakery Town's top idols, but are ignored by the audience and even abandoned by their agency CEO. Facing disbandment, they realize their dry looks are the problem and visit Bread Barbershop for a makeover. Can the Mocha Bun Boys transform into fresh, golden brown bread and finally rise to the top?

20.TitleEnglish: It's a Cruel World Out There
20.SummaryEnglish: Mrs. Roll Cake visits the barbershop, feeling devastated. It turns out to be because of her son who refuses to leave his room. After being persuaded by Bread and Wilk, Roll Cake decides to venture out. He encounters various challenges and faces the danger of the outside world. Will Roll Cake find the courage to leave the safety of his room and step out into the world?

21.SummaryEnglish: Wilk is scolded by Master Bread once again, and in a burst of frustration, he suddenly starts rapping! Director Popcorn, impressed by Wilk's hidden talent, suggests he try out for "Show Me the Meringue," a fierce hip-hop battle. As Wilk steps into the contest, charming judges and unique contestants are revealed. Will Wilk win their hearts and rise to the top?

22.SummaryEnglish: Wilk is scolded by Master Bread once again, and in a burst of frustration, he suddenly starts rapping! Director Popcorn, impressed by Wilk's hidden talent, suggests he try out for "Show Me the Meringue," a fierce hip-hop battle. As Wilk steps into the contest, charming judges and unique contestants are revealed. Will Wilk win their hearts and rise to the top?
